footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Thoma | Update Date: 06/13/2023 | Editor: ultimate.noob

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Favonius Lance__
Able to generate Energy particles for the entire team. Build enough CRIT Rate to utilize its passive; easier to do as you get refinements on it.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Engulfing Lightning__
The biggest Energy Recharge stat stick on the game. You'd use this on another character more often than not.

__Prototype Starglitter__
F2P Energy Recharge stat stick.

__The Catch__
A F2P Energy Recharge stat stick just like Prototype Starglitter. And just like Engulfing Lightning, you'd use this on another character more often than not.

__Black Tassel__
HP% stat stick to provide a bigger shield. Reaching Thoma's Energy Recharge tresholds with it can be a hassle.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> HP% or Energy Recharge |<goblet>  HP% |<circlet>  HP% or Crit Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Crimson Ooyoroi
**2)** Elemental Skill: Blazing Blessing
**3)** Normal Attack: Swiftshatter Spear

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Although the 4-piece Instructor is Thoma's theoretical best set in Hu Tao or Yoimiya teams, it comes with the caveat of being a 4-star maximum rarity artifact set. This means lower scalings on mainstats and substats and with that, a slimmer shield and harder to achieve Energy Recharge requirements.

footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Thoma | Update Date: 06/13/2023 | Editor: ultimate.noob

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Kitain Cross Spear__
Able to generate a abundant amount of energy for Thoma to capitalize

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Favonius Lance__
Able to generate Energy particles for the entire team. Build enough CRIT Rate to utilize its passive; easier to do as you get refinements on it.

__Dragon's Bane__
Provides a lot of EM for elemental reactions.

__Moonpiercer__
Provides some EM for elemental reactions.

**1)** Elemental Skill: Blazing Blessing 
**2)** Elemental Skill: Elemental Burst: Crimson Ooyoroi
**3)** Normal Attack: Swiftshatter Spear

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: The best role for a DPS Thoma. Due to Burgeon being a Transformative Reaction, EM and character level are the only things that affect damage. ATK and Talent Levels do not factor into Burgeon reactions and they cannot crit. Leveling your Thoma to 90 is extremely important; it's about a 30% damage difference from a level 80 Thoma. It is also possible to run Hybrid Thoma for a stronger shield to combat Burgeon self-DMG and enemy attacks while still dealing a good amount of damage.
